#summary Overview of Soundflower development resources.

= Introduction =

Soundflower was originally developed and financed by Cycling '74.  Good information still exists at Cycling 74's website:

  * http://www.cycling74.com/products/soundflower
  * http://www.cycling74.com/downloads/soundflower
  * [http://www.google.com/search?q=soundflower+site%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.cycling74.com%2Fforums&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a  Search the Cycling '74 Forums]

Additional contributions or resources have come by the way of:
  * [http://rogueamoeba.com/ Rogue Amoeba]
  * [http://thirdcog.eu/apps/soundflower Third Cog]
  * Morton Heller

= Notifications =

Notifications of activity in the Soundflower SVN source code repository or the Soundflower Wiki are sent to the [http://groups.google.com/group/soundflowerdev SoundFlowerDev Google group].  You can subscribe to the group if you want to keep abreast of changes.

If there is interest, a discussion forum could be set up at some point.
